price: 152. Maka ingatlah kepada-Ku, Aku pun akan ingat kepadamu! Bersyukurlah kepada-Ku, dan janganlah kamu ingkar kepada-Ku!*(50)
arabic: فَٱذۡكُرُونِيٓ أَذۡكُرۡكُمۡ وَٱشۡكُرُواْ لِي وَلَا تَكۡفُرُونِ
footnotes: *50). Aku limpahkan rahmat dan ampunan kepadamu.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-udh'kurūnī adhkur'kum wa-ush'kurū lī walā takfurūni
